name: Lock 'n' Roll
description:
OVER 15.5 MILLION HIGH-SCORES SUBMITTED!

Best App Ever Awards Finalist: "Best Dice Game"

Read any of the thousands of reviews, and you'll find out why you should play this game now!

Review from iphoneappreviewer.com: "Ladies and gentlemen, this is a fantastic dice strategy game. Highly recommended..."

______________

Lock 'n' Roll is an intriguing puzzle game requiring a combination of luck and skill. Roll four dice at a time and arrange them on a 4x4 grid. Receive points for various combinations according to number and color.

You must place all four dice and once you lock them down, they are fixed in place! The most difficult combinations are cleared from the board.

Earn enough points and be rewarded with a Joker! The game keeps going until there are no more places for dice. How high can you score? That's entirely up to you...

For the ad-free edition, search for "Lock 'n' Roll Pro"
